name: Thermoflexâ„¢ Crack/Joint Themo-Sealant
description: Thermoflex is a premium, single component, hot applied, asphalt/rubber joint and crack sealant. Furnished as a solid, it is an elastomeric sealant which is compatible with and bonds aggressively to clean and dry concrete or asphalt pavements. It is designed to be effective in a wide range of climates. It is a true direct fire product capable of being reheated and is especially effective under sealcoats, slurry seals and overlays because it will not bleed through.
